Text:
It revolutionized the entire world - no one needs petroleum any longer, since water will do just as well. It lead to the downfall of the OPEC nations and caused all nations to be energy independent, which allowed us to free up resources to use in curing all disease and strife, increasing everyone's wealth so there is no longer any poverty and now we're colonizing other planets.

Or it was a complete rubbish.

You decide :)
